description: An enrollment in a Nimbus Experiment saved to disk

userFacingName.description: Public name of the experiment displayed on "about:studies"

userFacingDescription.description: Short public description of the experiment displayed on on "about:studies"

isRollout.description: When this property is set to true, treat this experiment as a rollout. Rollouts are currently handled as single-branch experiments separated from the bucketing namespace for normal experiments. See also: https://mozilla-hub.atlassian.net/browse/SDK-405

featureIds.description: A list of featureIds the experiment contains configurations for.

experimentType.description: What kind of experiment this enrollment corresponds to.

active.description: Whether or not the enrollment is active.

lastSeen.description: The last time the experiment was seen.

force.description: Whether or not this was a force enrollment.

prefs.description: Information about prefs set by this enrollment.

name.description: The name of the pref that was set.

featureId.description: The ID of the feature that owns the variable that set this pref.

variable.description: The variable that set this pref.

branch.description: The branch the pref was set on.

originalValue.description: The original value before the experiment.

prefFlips.description: Information stored on this enrollment by the prefFlips feature. Only present if an experiment uses the prefFlips feature.

originalValues.description: Original values for prefs set by this experiment.

.*.description: The original value of the pref, or null if the pref was not set.

localizations.description:
Per-locale localization substitutions.

The top level key is the locale (e.g., "en-US" or "fr"). Each entry is a mapping of string IDs to their localized equivalents.

Only supported on desktop.

unenrollReason.description: The reason for unenrollment. Only present when the enrollment is inactive.

isFirefoxLabsOptIn.description: When this property is set to true, treat this experiment as aFirefox Labs experiment

firefoxLabsTitle.description: An optional string containing the Fluent ID for the title of the opt-in

firefoxLabsDescription.description: An optional string containing the Fluent ID for the description of the opt-in

DesktopExperimentBranch.description: The branch definition supported on Firefox Desktop 95+.

ratio.description: Relative ratio of population for the branch. e.g., if branch A=1 and branch B=3, then branch A would get 25% of the population.

firefoxLabsTitle.description: An optional string containing the title of the branch

featureId.description: The identifier for the feature flag.

value.description: The values that define the feature configuration. This should be validated against a schema.

ExperimentLocalizations.description: Per-locale localization substitutions. The top level key is the locale (e.g., "en-US" or "fr"). Each entry is a mapping of string IDs to their localized equivalents.
